author: Reuters
title: Gold jumps as virus fears drive safe-haven demand
description: US gold futures were up 0.6 per cent at $1,655.10.
content:
Gold rose to a one-week high on Monday as demand for the safe-haven metal rose due to worries over the worsening economic impact from the coronavirus pandemic.
Spot gold rose 0.6 per cent to $1,626.08 per ounce by 0736 GMT, after rising as much as 0.8 per ce… [+2142 chars]
